titleStmt.title: A mappe of mischiefe, or A dialogue betweene V. and E. concerning the going of Qu. M. into V, V. much lamenteth therefore, and if not comforted by E.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeare of deliverance, 1641.

notesStmt.note: Refers to the unpopular journey of Queen Henrietta Maria to Holland in 1641.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
